meanings.definition: Skill in achieving a desired end through cunning or deceit.
meanings.sent1: Her artfulnesses in negotiation always helped her get what she wanted.
meanings.sent2: The detective admired the criminal's artfulnesses in planning the heist.
meanings.sent3: The artfulnesses of the fox outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: His artfulnesses were like a spider weaving a web of deception.
meanings.sent5: The artfulnesses of the magician left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality of being artful or crafty.
meanings.sent1: She admired the cat's artfulnesses in catching mice.
meanings.sent2: The politician's success was due to his artfulnesses in public speaking.
meanings.sent3: The artfulnesses of the child were evident in the elaborate sandcastle.
meanings.sent4: The artfulnesses of the painter transformed a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The artfulnesses of the chef were displayed in the intricate dessert presentation.
